name: Escape the cold (Toby468)
description:
heatpack - warms you up and keeps you warm for a while

MRE - fills your hunger

energy drink - Makes you faster so you can get further from the storm

Press left mouse button to stop, right mouse button to jump.

Stop near the fridge or furnace to gain hunger and temperature if any of those hit 0 you lose, if you stand still the storm catches up to you and you lose as well :)
